versions.prompt: Add a remember me checkbox below the password field
versions.code:
import React from 'react';
import type { Meta, StoryObj } from '@storybook/react';
import { Card, Stack, TextInput, PasswordInput, Checkbox, Button, Title, Text, Anchor } from '@mantine/core';

const meta = {
  title: 'Generated/Login with Remember Me Checkbox',
  parameters: {
    layout: 'centered',
  },
} satisfies Meta;

export default meta;
type Story = StoryObj<typeof meta>;

export const Default: Story = {
  render: () => (
    <Card shadow="sm" padding="lg" radius="md" withBorder style={{ width: 400 }}>
      <Stack gap="md">
        <Stack gap="xs">
          <Title order={2}>Welcome Back</Title>
          <Text size="sm" c="dimmed">
            Sign in to your account to continue
          </Text>
        </Stack>

        <TextInput
          label="Email"
          placeholder="your@email.com"
          required
        />

        <PasswordInput
          label="Password"
          placeholder="Enter your password"
          required
        />

        <Checkbox
          label="Remember me"
          size="sm"
        />

        <Button fullWidth>
          Sign In
        </Button>

        <Text size="sm" ta="center" c="dimmed">
          Don't have an account?{' '}
          <Anchor href="#" size="sm">
            Sign up
          </Anchor>
        </Text>
      </Stack>
    </Card>
  ),
};

export const WithRememberMeChecked: Story = {
  render: () => (
    <Card shadow="sm" padding="lg" radius="md" withBorder style={{ width: 400 }}>
      <Stack gap="md">
        <Stack gap="xs">
          <Title order={2}>Welcome Back</Title>
          <Text size="sm" c="dimmed">
            Sign in to your account to continue
          </Text>
        </Stack>

        <TextInput
          label="Email"
          placeholder="your@email.com"
          required
        />

        <PasswordInput
          label="Password"
          placeholder="Enter your password"
          required
        />

        <Checkbox
          label="Remember me"
          size="sm"
          defaultChecked
        />

        <Button fullWidth>
          Sign In
        </Button>

        <Text size="sm" ta="center" c="dimmed">
          Don't have an account?{' '}
          <Anchor href="#" size="sm">
            Sign up
          </Anchor>
        </Text>
      </Stack>
    </Card>
  ),
};
